document.full_text: a texas border city has renamed a street and a private drive for jaime jorge zapata, the u.s. federal agent shot to death by suspected cartel hit men in mexico earlier this year, authorities said on friday.
document.title: texas city renames street, drive for slain ice agent
lines_and_colors: a texas border city has renamed a street and a private drive for jaime jorge zapata, the u.s. federal agent shot to death by suspected cartel hit men in mexico earlier this year, authorities said on friday.
